name: Off-road Animal Transport: Extreme Truck Drive
name_original: Off-road Animal Transport: Extreme Truck Drive
description:
Heavy Truck Driver! This time you have been called by the mountain village farmers and farms owners to transport their animals from one location to another but the real challenge is that the locations are extreme hilly tracks and dangerous mountainous ranges in Off-road Animal Transport: Extreme Truck Drive simulation truck driving game.
You will have to use your 4x4 extreme truck driving skill to transport these animals to their destination. In Off-road Animal Transport: Extreme Truck Drive simulation truck driving Farmville game you will deliver the farm animals from their pick up points to their destination safe and sound and in within the given timelines. You need to drive through different farms from lands, hills, agriculture lands, mountains etc. and transport the farms animals like horses, cows, sheep, camels, goat buffalos and many more. The skill is to deliver these animals without hurting and injuring them. These farms and livestock managers are looking forward towards you to accept this adventurous challenge and become the real truck driver transporter.
So download this exclusive Farmville transport game called Off-road Animal Transport: Extreme Truck Drive simulation and enjoy the heavy truck transport driving experience on magnificent mountains locations with the animal transport missions. So get your keys, start your engines and start the ultimate transportation journey with the fun and enjoyment!
Game Feature:
1) Amazing Environments & 3D Graphics
2) Beautiful and Colorful Sceneries
3) Smooth and Addictive Gameplay
4) Challenging Extreme Transport Missions
